original_text: So Jesus said to Peter, “Put your sword into its sheath; shall I not drink the cup that the Father has given me?”
korean_text: 예수께서 베드로더러 이르시되 칼을 칼집에 꽂으라 아버지께서 주신 잔을 내가 마시지 아니하겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Put your sword into its sheath;
shall I not drink the cup that the Father has given me?”
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아버지께서 주신 잔을 마시지 않겠느냐?”
